price: 24 lançant : « Ce n’est là que magie à laquelle il a été initié,
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
